title: Firefox freezes in music assistant, but not in incognito mode
content:
I have an issue where my firefox freezes whenever I try to take certain actions inside home assistants music assistant. I have created the following profiler of the issue https://share.firefox.dev/4pPZRPo

I have tried all the recommended settings to mitigate these kinds of problems (remove hardware acceleration, set disable all addons). I don't know where to report this exactly, but I'm hoping someone might be able to see something from the profiler that could illuminate what exactly is going wrong?

Notably this issue does not happen in firefox private mode.
creator: tue.boesen

title: Moje dane - historia przegladania, zapisane zakładki, wszystko zostało usunięte
content: Wieczorem po zakońcaeniu korzystania z przeglądarki jak zwykle wyłączyłam. Następnego dnia postanowiłam go uruchomić i nagle wyskoczyło mi jakieś okienko profilu co zignorowałam bo dla mnie ta funkcja ejst bezcelowa. Przeglądarka się odpaliła ale już bez moich danych - rozszerzeń, historii, a co najważniejsze bez zakładek! Konto mam zalogowane ale nie potrafi mi tego jakoś przywrócić.
creator: wiktoriaslowinska127

title: I installed an extension irvanview8792.  It was not irvan view but installed a photo behind each item on menu bar
content: I can't find urvanview 9582 to uninsatall. The picture that is behind very menu bar item makes it almost unreadable, e.g. tools, help, etc. I have looked for a way to uninstall the extension in hopes that might solve the problem. I can't find a way. I'm now concerned this may have installed a rat program. I'm thinking may best course may be to uninstall firefox and start over, Would appreciate any help.
creator: astrojny1

title: Best free online tool to convert image to vector?
content:
I often need to convert PNG or JPG images into vector format (SVG) for design purposes.

I found some online tools but most are paid or add watermarks. Recently I tested this free tool: https://topimgtools.com/image-to-vector.html

It worked without signup. Are there any other reliable free options you recommend?
creator: islamroman803

title: Password manager not launching sites
content: I use LastPass and I cannot open any login information from the vault. I click on "Launch" (picture uploaded) and nothing happens. If I have a site open I can auto-fill the Username/Password. Some of the sites are tailored to a specific page - I rely on this. It works in Edge and Chrome. It did work before today in Firefox (can't say when specifically). Firefox password management disabled.

title: pro cococut - Files larger than 1Gig show download finished but will not save.
content: I have been using pro cococut for several years with Firefox and have an issue with downloading and saving a file that is over 1Gig, the screen shows that the file downloaded but, when I try to save the file it errors out that there was not sufficient memory and will at times actually becomes locked-up & kick me out of Firefox. Most of the time I have to hit Ct-Alt-Delete and end Firefox/Mozilla. Don't know what to do to remedy this error. All files less than 1Gig download and save with no issue.
